editorialNotes.standard: If you can imagine it, you can create it—anything from monolithic towers to cavernous rollercoasters. That’s the idea that sparked a world-building phenomenon in Mojang’s amazing Minecraft. Since the game's release on the App Store, a steady stream of meaningful updates has kept this cube-filled universe fun, fresh and jam-packed with exciting features.

editorialNotes.standard: Cool reaction emoji! Strategy-smashing Nope cards! The fur truly flies in this slick adaptation of the zany card game.

editorialNotes.standard: If they see you coming, it’s too late! Your mind is still your best weapon in the updated version of this sneaky 2006 action game.

advisories: Frequent/Intense Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Build the perfect commute on your next commute with the hypnotic Mini Metro. Strategy buffs and casual gamers alike will enjoy expanding a busy transit system by linking stations, directing trains and upgrading lines. There’s a thrilling satisfaction in seeing underground lines come together—and since no two games play alike, we’re always trying out new designs.
editorialNotes.short: Construct the perfect commute in this underground masterpiece.

editorialNotes.standard: This acclaimed platformer motivates you to to brush off mistakes and charge back into battle again and again.

ios.subtitle: The moving story of a lifetime

editorialNotes.standard: Take your footage to the next level with complete control over your camera’s focus, exposure, frame rates and more. It’s powerful on its own but built to support external mics, lens adapters and other tools, putting pro-quality videography at your fingertips.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Mesmerising from start to finish, Monument Valley offers a world of uncanny beauty and constant wonder. To help a princess proceed on her mysterious quest, you’ll face ingenious puzzles that involve lifting and spinning the environment in seemingly impossible ways. It’s a mind-bending journey filled with the joy of discovery, making Ustwo’s adventure a must-play for gamers of every experience level.
editorialNotes.short: Traverse mind-bending levels that are structurally impossible

editorialNotes.standard: Limbo is a gripping blend of stark, haunting landscapes, bizarre characters and unsettling sounds. With clever puzzle design, an intriguing narrative and an excellent touch-screen control system, it’s as rewarding to play as it is interesting to look at and listen to.
editorialNotes.short: Dark, haunting, beautiful. This'll stay with you long after it's over.

name: Mystic Pillars: A Puzzle Game
artistName: Holy Cow Productions India Private Limited

ios.subtitle: The Best Hack n Slash Games

editorialNotes.standard: Mullets, malls and flying bikes? We had a rad time spotting nods to the ’80s while defending a camp from monsters in this 2D strategy game.

The infection has begun and it’s up to you to strategically spread and evolve a deadly plague to bring about the end of the human race. Saving the world and being a hero is honourable, but decimating the world with a deadly infection is a whole lot of fun — even though it shouldn’t be.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: Jump in and save the ninjas!

name: Ticket to Ride® The Board Game

editorialNotes.tagline: Put an end to the terror

editorialNotes.short: Something's very wrong here. Can you get out alive?

editorialNotes.standard: You might get stuck the first time you play Gorogoa. But once the gears of your brain settle into the right configurations, you’ll see how smart this mix of art and perspective really is. Layers pile upon layers, doors transport you between realities, strange creatures and wild environments blend together into a fascinating interactive collage you’ll want to peel apart to discover what lies underneath.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Randomly generated levels keep every punishing platforming challenge fresh as you dash to save your kid.

Elegant but packed with personality, Zip Zap kept us happily tinkering for hours. To solve its deceptively tricky puzzles, you’ll set Rube Goldberg–style hinges and levers into motion with strategically timed taps. The bite-sized levels and one-finger controls make it perfect for quick escapes.

ios.subtitle: More A Little to the Left!

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Imagine WALL·E directed by Tim Burton—that’s the weird, wonderful world of Machinarium. But this cute robot’s quest for love combines tons more influences—like point-and-click adventures, hidden-object puzzlers, and comic books—for a truly unique experience. Challenging but full of awesome “aha!” moments, it’s an artistic odyssey that looks amazing on iPhone, iPad, or Apple TV.

After a long day at work, it’s bath time! But Swampy’s shower is broken and he needs your help to guide the water to him. Navigate a path through the dirt past contraptions and obstacles to get every drop to fill the bath.

Zipping down snowy hills, trying to stay ahead of a massive avalanche—the pressure’s always on in this infinite-racing classic. And we love that whirlwind pace, fuelled by landing backflips and hitching rides on penguins, snowmobiles and yetis. From the game’s masterful one-touch controls to its cheery music, every aspect feels perfectly tuned to keep you playing through long afternoons and late nights.

Our beloved Om Nom is on another quest for candy, and not even the supernatural will get in the way of his sweet tooth. Featuring a totally revamped (and gorgeous) visual style and tons of new gameplay elements, Cut the Rope: Magic totally transforms the series—as well as our hungry hero. For the first time ever, Om Nom can morph into all sorts of creatures—from a bird to a baby to a mouse—to solve each enchanting puzzle.
